name: Corpse Reviver #5
description: This spin on the classic Corpse Reviver cocktail from Rickhouse in San Francisco is light and refreshing.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce pineapple gum syrup (such as Small Hand Foods)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add tequila, Cocchi Americano, pineapple gum syrup, and lemon juice. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass.
Top drink with 2 dashes absinthe. Garnish with a lemon twist.
